Quickstart

Get connected to BetterSwap in minutes.

Before You Begin

Download the official VeWorld wallet at veworld.net. For help setting up your VeWorld wallet, read the official documentation.

Connection Options

BetterSwap supports two convenient ways to access the platform:

  • VeWorld Wallet — The traditional blockchain wallet approach
  • Social Login — Powered by VeChain SDK for a seamless web2-like experience

Option 1: Connect with VeWorld Wallet

Step 1: Open the VeWorld Browser

1

Launch VeWorld

Open the VeWorld app on your device.
2

Navigate to the Discover Tab

Go to the Discover tab. This is where you'll find decentralized applications (dApps) like BetterSwap.

Step 2: Connect Your VeWorld Wallet

1

Find BetterSwap

In the Discover tab, search for BetterSwap or visit betterswap.io directly.
2

Click Connect Wallet

Once on the BetterSwap interface, click the Connect Wallet button in the top right corner.
3

Select VeWorld Wallet

Select VeWorld Wallet from the available options. You may be prompted to approve the connection request.

Option 2: Connect with Social Login

Step 1: Access BetterSwap

1

Visit the platform

Visit betterswap.io in any web browser (or within the VeWorld app if installed).
2

Click Connect Wallet

Click the Connect Wallet button in the top right corner.

Step 2: Choose Social Login

1

Select Social Login

Select Social Login from the connection options.
2

Choose your platform

Choose your preferred social platform (Google, Apple, etc.).
3

Authenticate

Complete the authentication process through your selected platform.
4

Wallet created

A non-custodial wallet will be automatically created for you using VeChain SDK technology.

Start Swapping Tokens

1

View your balances

After connecting, your token balances will be displayed in the trading interface.
2

Select tokens

Select the tokens you wish to exchange from the dropdown menus.
3

Enter amount

Enter the amount you want to swap and review the transaction details.
4

Confirm

Click Swap and confirm the transaction in your VeWorld wallet or via the social login interface.

Your transaction will be processed securely through the VeChainThor blockchain, utilizing BetterSwap's aggregation protocol to find the most efficient trading route.
